Anoynmous

MiP Soluzioni (logo)

From 2009 this is my lifeline.

Being a business owner means to stop to make distinction between night and day, between weekdays and holidays.

Doesn't matter how much bigger were the companies I worked for or I worked in, my own business was always there waiting for me.
